name: Google Drive Dark 2018
description: This style adds a dark theme to the Google Drive webpage. It also makes slight modifications to the appearance of certain elements, including restoring the blue new button and adding mouse over effects for items. There is also support for add-ons that add additional modifications (see bottom of description) THIS STYLE REQUIRES THE NEW GOOGLE DRIVE Available on GitHub Currently themed: - main page - file list and cards - quick access - side navigation - new file button - context menus - account switcher - Google apps selector Coming soon: - details pane Add-ons: ADD-ON | Less Rounded Corners - Google Drive Dark 2018 ADD-ON | Custom Background - Google Drive Dark 2018
additional_info:
v1.1
-info pane
v1.0.3

- fix Google app drawer
- fix account switcher
- fix search bar
v1.0.2
- fixed background color when dragging files from PC to Drive
v1.0.1
- fixed color when dragging files and folders
v1.0
- initial release
